includedAssets.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
includedAssets.synopsis: Top comedy with pinpoint performances from chardonnay-loving singleton Renee Zellweger and rotter Hugh Grant, not forgetting a certain pair of pants.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Top comedy with pinpoint performances from chardonnay-loving singleton Renee Zellweger and rotter Hugh Grant, not forgetting a certain pair of pants.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Renee Zellweger may be American but she's perfectly imperfect as the hopelessly single Londoner who measures her days in cigarettes, units of alcohol and cringing embarrassments. In fact, the casting is perfect all round as Colin Firth and Hugh Grant duke it out as Bridget's chalk-and-cheese (or should that be Chardonnay and shandy? ) suitors - Firth as starchy Mark Darcy, Grant as her roguish boss Daniel Cleaver - in author Helen Fielding's joyous adaptation of her own painfully funny bestseller. You'll never go near a fireman's pole again.

includedAssets.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge Of Reason
includedAssets.synopsis: Renee Zellweger is back, but still torn between steady Colin Firth and slimy Hugh Grant. Will it be wedding cake or comfort ice cream for bumbling Bridget?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Renee Zellweger is back, but still torn between steady Colin Firth and slimy Hugh Grant. Romcom.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Renee Zellweger is back, but still torn between steady Colin Firth and slimy Hugh Grant. Will it be wedding cake or comfort ice cream for bumbling Bridget?

includedAssets.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
includedAssets.synopsis: Bridget Jones (Renée Zellweger) is back on the big screen and - as per usual - trouble isn't too far away. Despite being 43 and single she refuses to let life get her down, pushing on with her career as a TV news producer and partying with younger presenter pal Sarah Solemani. It looks like things are on the up, but after a pair of one-night stands and the use of some dodgy, dolphin-friendly condoms she winds up pregnant. Is the father US dating guru Jack (Patrick Dempsey) or old flame Mark Darcy (Colin Firth)? Original director Sharon Maguire is back calling the shots, while top support comes from the likes of Jim Broadbent and Emma Thompson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After a pair of one-night stands the now single Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) winds up pregnant, but who's the father? Comedy sequel.

includedAssets.title: Bridget Jones 3 Film Collection
includedAssets.synopsis: Renée Zellweger stars as the unlucky in love Bridget Jones, torn between the stoic Colin Firth and the sleazy Hugh Grant. Three movie box set featuring 2016's Bridget Jones's Baby, starring Patrick Dempsey (Grey's Anatomy).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Renée Zellweger is the hapless Bridget, torn between Colin Firth and Hugh Grant. Includes 2016's Bridget Jones's Baby, starring Patrick Dempsey.
